languages.text: {n}Священные речи заставляют одержимого биться в корчах, но сила вашей веры превосходит мощь нечистого духа. Из ушей и из-под респиратора техножреца текут струи кипящего машинного масла. Слово за словом, вы выдавливаете его прочь из тела невинного — назад, в небытие варпа.{/n}

{n}The sacred words cause the possessed man to convulse, but the strength of your faith prevails over the unholy spirit's power. Boiling machine oil streams down from the Tech-Priest's ears and his breathing mask. Word after word, you push the abomination out of his innocent flesh and back into the warp's oblivion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Священные речи заставляют одержимого биться в корчах, но сила вашей веры превосходит мощь нечистого духа. Из ушей и из-под респиратора техножреца текут струи кипящего машинного масла. Слово за словом, вы выдавливаете его прочь из тела невинного — назад, в небытие варпа.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durch die heiligen Worte beginnt der Besessene zu zucken, doch die Stärke deines Glaubens siegt über die Macht des unheiligen Geists. Kochendes Maschinenöl strömt aus den Ohren des Techpriesters und seiner Atemmaske. Wort für Wort drückst du die Abscheulichkeit aus seinem unschuldigen Fleisch und zurück in die Leere des Warps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacred words cause the possessed man to convulse, but the strength of your faith prevails over the unholy spirit's power. Boiling machine oil streams down from the Tech-Priest's ears and his breathing mask. Word after word, you push the abomination out of his innocent flesh and back into the warp's oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch die heiligen Worte beginnt der Besessene zu zucken, doch die Stärke deines Glaubens siegt über die Macht des unheiligen Geists. Kochendes Maschinenöl strömt aus den Ohren des Techpriesters und seiner Atemmaske. Wort für Wort drückst du die Abscheulichkeit aus seinem unschuldigen Fleisch und zurück in die Leere des Warps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles sacrées provoquent des convulsions chez l'homme possédé, mais la puissance de votre foi est plus forte que celle de l'esprit impie. Des flux bouillants de lubrifiant mécanique se déversent des oreilles du technoprêtre et de son masque respiratoire. Progressivement, vous repoussez l'abomination hors de l'enveloppe de chair et la rejetez dans le vide du Warp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacred words cause the possessed man to convulse, but the strength of your faith prevails over the unholy spirit's power. Boiling machine oil streams down from the Tech-Priest's ears and his breathing mask. Word after word, you push the abomination out of his innocent flesh and back into the warp's oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles sacrées provoquent des convulsions chez l'homme possédé, mais la puissance de votre foi est plus forte que celle de l'esprit impie. Des flux bouillants de lubrifiant mécanique se déversent des oreilles du technoprêtre et de son masque respiratoire. Progressivement, vous repoussez l'abomination hors de l'enveloppe de chair et la rejetez dans le vide du Warp.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到神圣的祷告之后，被附身的技术神甫浑身抽搐着。到最后，你的信仰之力战胜了恶灵的力量。技术神甫的耳朵和呼吸面罩流出了滚烫的机油。你的祷词一句接一句，慢慢地将这个可憎之物从受害者的肉体中驱逐出来，把它赶回了亚空间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacred words cause the possessed man to convulse, but the strength of your faith prevails over the unholy spirit's power. Boiling machine oil streams down from the Tech-Priest's ears and his breathing mask. Word after word, you push the abomination out of his innocent flesh and back into the warp's oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到神圣的祷告之后，被附身的技术祭司浑身抽搐着。到最后，你的信仰之力战胜了恶灵的力量。技术祭司的耳朵和呼吸面罩流出了滚烫的机油。你的祷词一句接一句，慢慢地将这个可憎之物从受害者的肉体中驱逐出来，把它赶回了亚空间。{/n}

languages.text: {n}神聖なる言葉ではりつけの男の体がピクピクと震えるが、こちらの信仰心の強さが不浄の精霊の力に打ち勝った。沸騰した機械油が技術司祭の耳と呼吸マスクから流れ出る。言葉をひとつずつ紡いで男の無垢な肉体から悪魔を押し出し、歪みの忘我へと戻した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacred words cause the possessed man to convulse, but the strength of your faith prevails over the unholy spirit's power. Boiling machine oil streams down from the Tech-Priest's ears and his breathing mask. Word after word, you push the abomination out of his innocent flesh and back into the warp's oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}神聖なる言葉で張り付けの男の体はピクピクと震えたが、こちらの信仰心の強さが不浄の精霊の力に打ち勝った。沸騰した機械油が、技術司祭の耳と呼吸マスクから流れ出る。言葉をひとつずつ紡いで、男の無垢な肉体から悪魔を押し出し、<歪み>の忘我へと帰っていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las palabras sagradas hacen convulsionar al poseído, pero la fuerza de tu fe prevalece sobre el poder del espíritu impío. De los oídos del Tecnosacerdote y de su máscara respiratoria sale aceite de máquina hirviendo. Palabra tras palabra, empujas la abominación fuera de su carne inocente y de vuelta al olvido de la disformidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacred words cause the possessed man to convulse, but the strength of your faith prevails over the unholy spirit's power. Boiling machine oil streams down from the Tech-Priest's ears and his breathing mask. Word after word, you push the abomination out of his innocent flesh and back into the warp's oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras sagradas hacen convulsionar al poseído, pero la fuerza de tu fe prevalece sobre el poder del espíritu impío. De los oídos del Tecnosacerdote y de su máscara respiratoria sale aceite de máquina hirviendo. Palabra tras palabra, empujas la abominación fuera de su carne inocente y de vuelta al olvido de la disformidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kutsal sözcükler, ele geçirilen adamın kıvranmasına neden oluyor ancak imanın, uğursuz ruhun gücüne karşı galip geliyor. Fokurdayan makine yağı, Tekno Rahip'in kulaklarından ve solunum maskesinden boşalıyor. Her bir sözcüğünle, bu menfur varlığı rahibin masum bedeninden çıkarıp öteboyutun hiçliğine itiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacred words cause the possessed man to convulse, but the strength of your faith prevails over the unholy spirit's power. Boiling machine oil streams down from the Tech-Priest's ears and his breathing mask. Word after word, you push the abomination out of his innocent flesh and back into the warp's oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kutsal sözcükler, ele geçirilen adamın kıvranmasına neden oluyor. İnancınsa kâfir ruhun gücüne karşı galip geliyor. Fokurdayan makine yağı, Tekno Rahip'in kulaklarından süzülürken nefesi tekliyor. Her bir sözcüğünle, bu menfur varlığı rahibin masum teninden çıkarıp öteboyutun hiçliğine itiyorsun.{/n}
